data.eml:eml: Revision of Chlororithra Butler, 1889 (Lepidoptera, Geometridae, Geometrinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Hongxiang, Han, Hongmei, Li, Dayong, Xue (2006): Revision of Chlororithra Butler, 1889 (Lepidoptera, Geometridae, Geometrinae). Zootaxa 1221: 29-39, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.172575
